mapper.select: SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(A.MNUM, -4)), 0) + 1, 4, 0) MNUM FROM TR_MEMBER A
SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(A.ANUM, -4)), 0) + 1, 4, 0) ANUM FROM TR_APPROVAL A
SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(A.BNUM, -4)), 0) + 1, 4, '0') AS BNUM FROM TR_BOARD A WHERE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(INSERTDATE)) = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE))
SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(A.RNUM, -4)), 0) + 1, 4, '0') RNUM FROM TR_RBOARD A
SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(A.WNUM, -4)), 0 ) + 1, 4, '0') WNUM FROM TR_WORK A
